utterance.content: for which journey do you wish to purchase a ticket
from Euston to Manchester Picadilly please
do you hold a current credit or debit card
and what date is it you're travelling out
i'm going to arrange for you to collect your tickets from the train station tomorrow
what time do you like to depart
and when is it you're returning
the cheapest fare that i can offer you at that time is the Virgin Value Business at 75 pounds
you must go out on the 7:55 in the morning
if i provisionally book you on a return service
you're able to get the next available service
or you don't need to book a return
would you like smoking or non-smoking on your outward service
if you have to cancel your ticket
it's a full refund less 5 pounds
you've got to travel out on the 7:55 tomorrow
but you can come back at any time that suits yourself
going to arrange for you to collect your tickets from the train station
you said yourself it's a credit card holder
it has to be the credit card holder that collects the tickets from the train station
you'll have to em cancel it then
is it a private card or a business card
it has to be the the person who collects the tickets that signs for
the cre... credit card holder has to sign for them
